creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: profile of a young man seated at a desk facing R, reading a book in his hands; an open book is propped up on the R side of the desk along with an inkwell and quill
inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription

-- in graphite on verso: [Moriz or Michal Plonski | 1782-c.1850 | Le B 8 i/ii]
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed, dated, and inscribed in plate, at bottom: [M. Plonski f 1802 a Amsterdam]
title: Young Man Reading
